A

App - WizardTD中的类
App class is the main class that contains all critical methods to build the game.
App() - 类 的构造器WizardTD.App
Set up a configuration file path when the app is launched.

B

banishMonster() - 类 中的方法WizardTD.Monster
The monster will be banished when it reaches the wizard house and respawn at the starting position.
BOARD_WIDTH - 类 中的静态变量WizardTD.App
 
buildNewTower() - 类 中的方法WizardTD.GameInterface
Build new tower in the gameboard.
Bullet - WizardTD中的类
Bullet is fired from the tower to attack a target monster.
Bullet(float, float, int, Monster, PImage) - 类 的构造器WizardTD.Bullet
 
Button - WizardTD中的类
Button can be clicked and will affect the gameplay based on their uses.
Button(String, String, char, int, int) - 类 的构造器WizardTD.Button

Monster's path finding algorithm using BFS search.

G
